thread.title: Dirty Projectors and D∆WN Team for New Song “Cool Your Heart,” Co-Written by Solange
thread.title_full: Dirty Projectors and D∆WN Team for New Song “Cool Your Heart,” Co-Written by Solange

author: Amy Phillips and Sam Sodomsky
title: Dirty Projectors and D∆WN Team for New Song “Cool Your Heart,” Co-Written by Solange
text:
Dirty Projectors and D∆WN Team for New Song “Cool Your Heart,” Co-Written by Solange Watch the time-twisting video 
Dirty Projectors have shared the video for “Cool Your Heart,” from their upcoming self-titled album . The song, which premiered on Zane Lowe's show on Beats 1 today, features vocals from D∆WN and was co-written by Solange. (Dave Longstreth previously collaborated on last year’s A Seat at the Table . According to a press release, “Cool Your Heart” was written "during breaks from sessions for Solange's album. " ) Tyondai Braxton contributed additional production and Mauro Refosco contributed percussion. The clip was directed by Noel Paul & Stefan Moore and features Longstreth and D∆WN in a time-twisting nighttime tableau. Watch it below. 
The band has previously shared new album tracks “ Keep Your Name ,” “ Little Bubble ,” and “ Up in Hudson .” Dirty Projectors is out February 24 via Domino.
